system.description:
An outsider is at least partially composed of the essence (but not necessarily the material) of some plane other than the Material Plane. Some creatures start out as some other type and become outsiders when they attain a higher (or lower) state of spiritual existence.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to total Hit Dice (as fighter); good Fortitude, Reflex, and Will saves; skill points (8 + Int modifier) per Hit Die.

Traits: Outsiders breathe but do not need to eat or sleep (native outsiders breathe, eat, and sleep); when slain, no soul is set looseâ€”raise dead, reincarnate, and resurrection do not work (native subtype can be raised as normal); darkvision 60 ft.; proficient with simple and martial weapons.
